it.polimi.deib.newdem.adrenaline.view.client.gui

Class GUIHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.deib.newdem.adrenaline.view.client.gui.GUIHelper

  • public class GUIHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that provide utility methods to interact with the game window.

    • Method Summary
